data.name: Flipout
data.description:
Butterfly, backstroke, or freestyle! Swim around just like a real turtle, no buttons or joysticks required! Play on your own or join your fellow turtles in a public or private game. Enjoy anything from showing off your tricks on the diving board to exploring hidden treasures!

There are currently three unique game modes:

Turtle Ball: An underwater game of two-team dodgeball. Hit turtles on the other team to switch them to your own team. Last team standing wins!

Zones: A game where turtles race to randomly safe zones that spawn randomly around the ocean. Anyone too slow will be frozen and can slow down unfrozen turtles.

Casual: Hang out with other turtles with no rules!

changelog.change_log:
New Waterslide

Added back Zones Gamemode

Added Casual Gamemode

Overhauled Gamemode system

Zone Tweaks

Bug Fixes

Waterslide

New Gamemode Switcher

Added back Zones Gamemode

Added Casual Gamemode

Bug Fixes

Added adaptive sounds

Fixed room joining

Added particles

Fixed slider behavior

CHANGELOG

- Added Leaderboard

- Players now collide

- Changed sound FX volumes

- Decreased haptic intensity

- Added waterfall sound FX


BUG FIXES

- Manhunt game mode should now function

- Fixed hand hitbox

- Fixed hand rotation not syncing between players

- Players out of the map will teleport to spawn

CHANGELOG

- New Current Streams

- New setting to mute and report players

- New "manhunt" game mode

BUG FIXES

- Players on old versions can no longer join updated servers

- Games ending early should be fixed again

- Patched an out of map exploit

- Matchmaking is more random

- Networking improvements

- Fixed game mode not saving

- Client names now update on room sign

CHANGELOG

- New Current Streams

- New setting to mute and report players

- New "manhunt" game mode

BUG FIXES

- Players on old versions can no longer join updated servers

- Games ending early should be fixed again

- Patched an out of map exploit

- Matchmaking is more random

- Networking improvements

CHANGELOG

- Frozen players are given the 'Ice Turtle' visual

- Last player to zone no longer will become an 'Ice Turtle'

- Any player in the zone will trigger a countdown

- After the countdown, any player outside of zone will become an 'Ice Turtle'

- Countdown progressively speeds up as round continues

- Added leaderboard

- Each round the winning player is given 10 points.


BUG FIXES

- 'Ice Turtle' can now freeze players

- Fixed bugs related to rendering order

- Private rooms are now removed from available rooms

- Reduced voice chat bitrate

- Reduced network calls

- Performance improvements

CHANGELOG

- Testing new game mode

- Added toggle for joystick turn


BUG FIXES

- Tag sound no longer plays for entire server

- If all tagged players leave a new one is selected

CHANGELOG

- Implemented snap turn
- Implemented smooth turn
- Added tutorial area
- Added player volume slider
- Waterfall splash
- Increased default swim speed
- Decreased climb friction
- Players can now see if they are out
- Out players now have 'frozen' skin
- Out players no longer slow down players
- Out players now temporarily freeze players
- At the start of a round, a random player is automatically 'frozen'
- Safe zone size changes with remaining players
- Players out of map will respawn
- Changed zone warning color to orange
- Implemented moderate name moderation

BUG FIXES

- Players can no longer get out of map
- Fixed players freezing when zone resets
- Players are now visible through water
- Fixed players spawning under the map
- Fixed game ending early
- Added colliders to climbing rocks
- Performance improvements
